content: Shhh, don’t mention that K word. To me they look like fashion’s biggest victims — FEMA needs to be called in. Alternatively, they look like adults pretending to be children playing dress-up. And while we’re on the K subject, how often have they lent their “fame” (which is like a car wreck you can’t turn your head from kind of fame) for A CHARITABLE CAUSE? (I don’t know because I cannot keep up with them — it’s not like what they’re known for.)
